titleStmt.title: The iniquity of the late Solemne League, or Covenant discovered: by way of a letter to a gentleman desiring information upon the poynt. Whereunto is subjoyned the Covenant it selfe.

notesStmt.note: A London counterfeit of the Oxford edition (Madan). In this edition, title page line 8 has "by way of a letter"; A2r last line has "Resolute".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
